content: , July 16-20.The conference welcomes academics (business/economics professors andadministrators), as well as corporation / government executives and economists.

tag: html body text div p span
content: Participants may organize panels (please ask for or browse the

tag: html body text div p b a span
html body text div p span
content: ),present papers, participate in poster sessions, chair sessions, discuss papers,participate in round-table discussions, or simply observe. The program willconsist of:

tag: html body text div p span
content: � small concurrent sessions with: chairperson, presenters, and at least onediscussant assigned to comment on each paper;

tag: html body text div p span
html body text div p span
content: � roundtable thematic discussion sessions with moderator;

tag: html body text div p span
html body text div p span
content: � time allocated for each presenter is 20 minutes.

tag: html body text div p span
content: * To ORGANIZE PANELS please ask for "Panel Organizer Guidelines". Thefee for each participant in the panel, except the organizer, is $370. The feefor the panel organizer is $180.

tag: html body text div p span
content: * To participate as a PRESENTER please submit ABSTRACTS and/or PAPERS:

tag: html body text div p b span span
html body text div p span
content: � Please, submit your abstract (of no more than 200 words) via email

tag: html body text div p b a span
html body text div p span
content: by MARCH 15, 2007.Additionally, mail two hard copies of your

tag: html body text div p span
content: abstract (see address below). All abstracts submittedwill be evaluated for presentation and publication in the Book of Abstracts whichwill be available at the Conference;

tag: html body text div p span
content: � You may submit abstracts for no more than 2 papers;

tag: html body text div p span
content: � Abstracts/papers must not have been published, accepted, or submitted forpublication elsewhere;

tag: html body text div p span
content: � The categories that best fit your paper must be typed on the top right cornerof the front page (See below table titled "Subject Category Title andNumber");

tag: html body text div p span
content: � For co-authorships please include names, affiliations, and addresses of allauthors and indicate who will serve as presenter;

tag: html body text div p span
content: � The title of your abstract(s) or paper(s) is(are):

tag: html body text div p span

content: � Please submit via post 2 hard copies of the paper(s) and a disk containingthe manuscript(s) in Word by APRIL 30, 2007.

tag: html body text div p span
content: � Unless you instruct us otherwise, all papers will pass a blind peer reviewprocess for publication consideration in the '2007 GLOBAL BUSINESS &ECONOMICS ANTHOLOGY', a volume of selected papers from the Conference. Formatinstructions will be attached to the acceptance for publication letter.[Manuscripts of more than 12 single-spaced pages of text (font: times, size=10)inclusive of graphs, tables, endnotes and references will be considered at $10per additional page];
